channel.title: Please someone help me size down the Chaotic Maul
channel.description:
Please someone I need help it's urgent, I will send you the cache files if needed, but anyways the problem is the chaotic maul is way too big, i want to know how to make it the right size it is on Runescape. please someone help! let me know with a reply or an inbox message if you can help me!
EDIT: the server is a 317 and I am guessing the client is as well, it is the Nividia 317 source!
